newsArray.title: I Follow Rohit Sharma leadership Style but... Suryakumar Yadav commented ahead of india vs south africa t20i series
creator: Bharat Malhotra
newsArray.description: रोहित शर्मा की कप्तानी को लेकर कुछ सवाल उठे लेकिन सूर्यकुमार यादव ने साफ कहा कि वह अपनी कप्तानी में रोहित के स्टाइल को फॉलो करते हैं. यादव की कप्तानी में भारत चार टी20 इंटरनेशनल मैचों की सीरीज खेलने साउथ अफ्रीका पहुंचा है. The post I Follow Rohit Sharma leadership Style but... Suryakumar Yadav commented ahead of india vs south africa t20i series appeared first on Cricket Country.

newsArray.title: चैंपियंस ट्रॉफी: पाकिस्तान जिद छोड़ने को तैयार, भारत यूएई में खेल सकता है मैच
creator: News18 Hindi
newsArray.description: पाकिस्तान क्रिकेट बोर्ड आईसीसी चैंपियंस ट्रॉफी की मेजबानी को लेकर अपनी जिद छोड़ने को तैयार हो गया है. पाक बोर्ड (पीसीबी) अपने पिछले रुख से पीछे हटते हुए चैंपियंस ट्रॉफी 2025 के कार्यक्रम में बदलाव करने को तैयार है.

newsArray.title: India vs South Africa T20 2024: ঘরে ক্লিনসুইপ, ‘লিডার’ রোহিতকে নিয়ে যা বলছেন টি-টোয়েন্টি ক্যাপ্টেন সূর্য
creator: TV9 Bangla
newsArray.description: IND vs SA T20I 2024, Suryakumar Yadav: টি-টোয়েন্টি বিশ্বকাপে দক্ষিণ আফ্রিকাকে হারিয়েই চ্যাম্পিয়ন হয়েছিল ভারত। রোহিতের নেতৃত্বে দীর্ঘ ১৭ বছর পর টি-টোয়েন্টিতে বিশ্বচ্যাম্পিয়ন। এ বার তাদের বিরুদ্ধে দ্বিপাক্ষিক সিরিজ। তার আগে সাংবাদিক সম্মেলনে রোহিত প্রশ্নের মুখে পড়লেন সূর্যকুমার যাদব। কী বলছেন তিনি?

newsArray.title: South Africa vs India, 1st T20I Key Player Battle To Watch: पहले टी20 मुकाबले में साउथ अफ्रीका के गेंदबाज मचाएंगे तांडव या भारतीय बल्लेबाजों को होगा दबदबा? इन खिलाड़ियों के बीच होगी कांटे की टक्कर
newsArray.description: 4 मैचों की इस सीरीज में भारतीय टीम की कप्तानी सूर्यकुमार यादव करेंगे. इस सीरीज में कुछ युवा भारतीय खिलाड़ी भी अपना डेब्यू कर सकते हैं. दूसरी तरफ प्रोटियाज टीम की कमान एडेन मार्करम संभालेंगे. सीरीज का पहला मुकाबला डरबन के किंग्समीड मैदान पर खेला जाएगा. सीरीज के लिए दोनों टीमों का ऐलान कर दिया गया है.

newsArray.title: IND vs AUS: Six Indian Legends Whose Careers Ended With Border-Gavaskar Trophy
creator: ABP News Bureau
newsArray.description: India vs Australia Border-Gavaskar series is set to begin on November 22, with stakes running high for several senior Indian players. Following India's recent 3-0 home defeat to New Zealand, reports suggest that the Test careers of star players like Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma may be on the line.IND vs AUS Border-Gavaskar series might be the last chance for some Indian senior players, including Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma, to prove themselves. In past Border-Gavaskar encounters, Test careers of six Indian legends came to an end. Here's a look at those notable names.Also on ABP Live | India Unlikely To Travel To Pakistan For Champions Trophy; PCB Ready To Follow 'Hybrid Model'MS Dhoni, among India's most accomplished captains, ended his Test career in a Border-Gavaskar series match. His last appearance in the Tests took place on the iconic Melbourne grounds.VVS Laxman, one of Test cricket's legendary batters, played his career's final Test match during IND vs AUS Border-Gavaskar Trophy series. In an Adelaide Test, he scored one run in the first innings and 25 in the second.Sourav Ganguly, who crafted many memorable moments for India as captain, concluded his Test career in Border-Gavaskar series. In his final Test in Nagpur in 2008, Ganguly scored a solid 85 runs in the first innings but was dismissed for a duck in the second.Virender Sehwag, renowned for his fearless and aggressive batting, ended his Test career in the Border-Gavaskar series. His final Test match was played against Australia in 2013 at Hyderabad.Rahul Dravid, the "Wall" of Indian cricket, concluded his Test career in IND vs AUS Border-Gavaskar series. His final Test match was against Australia in 2012 at Adelaide Oval.Anil Kumble, India's legendary spin bowler, played his final Test match in Border-Gavaskar series. In 2008, Kumble featured in his last Test against Australia in Delhi, where despite the dominance of batsmen, he claimed three wickets.

newsArray.title: Shreyas Iyer Double Ton, Nishant Sindhu Takes Eight Wickets in Ranji Trophy 2024
newsArray.description: Star Indian batter Shreyas Iyer, who was not included in India’s 18-member squad picked for the upcoming five-match Test series against Australia, registered his best score in First Class cricket on Thursday (November 7) by scoring 233 runs for Mumbai in the ongoing Ranji Trophy Elite Group A match against Odisha. The 29-year-old right-handed batter came out to bat at No. 5 for the Ajinkya Rahane-led side at Sharad Pawar Cricket Academy BKC in Mumbai, and during his 228-ball stay at the crease, he hammered 24 fours and nine sixes. He added 354 runs for the fourth wicket with Siddhesh Lad, who was unbeaten on 165 runs from 331 balls at the time of lunch on Day 2.

newsArray.title: South Africa vs India, 1st T20I Key Player Battle To Watch: पहले टी20 मुकाबले में साउथ अफ्रीका के गेंदबाज मचाएंगे तांडव या भारतीय बल्लेबाजों को होगा दबदबा? इन खिलाड़ियों के बीच होगी कांटे की टक्कर
newsArray.description: 4 मैचों की इस सीरीज में भारतीय टीम की कप्तानी सूर्यकुमार यादव करेंगे. इस सीरीज में कुछ युवा भारतीय खिलाड़ी भी अपना डेब्यू कर सकते हैं. दूसरी तरफ प्रोटियाज टीम की कमान एडेन मार्करम संभालेंगे. सीरीज का पहला मुकाबला डरबन के किंग्समीड मैदान पर खेला जाएगा. सीरीज के लिए दोनों टीमों का ऐलान कर दिया गया है.

newsArray.title: IND vs AUS: Six Indian Legends Whose Careers Ended With Border-Gavaskar Trophy
creator: ABP News Bureau
newsArray.description: India vs Australia Border-Gavaskar series is set to begin on November 22, with stakes running high for several senior Indian players. Following India's recent 3-0 home defeat to New Zealand, reports suggest that the Test careers of star players like Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma may be on the line.IND vs AUS Border-Gavaskar series might be the last chance for some Indian senior players, including Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma, to prove themselves. In past Border-Gavaskar encounters, Test careers of six Indian legends came to an end. Here's a look at those notable names.Also on ABP Live | India Unlikely To Travel To Pakistan For Champions Trophy; PCB Ready To Follow 'Hybrid Model'MS Dhoni, among India's most accomplished captains, ended his Test career in a Border-Gavaskar series match. His last appearance in the Tests took place on the iconic Melbourne grounds.VVS Laxman, one of Test cricket's legendary batters, played his career's final Test match during IND vs AUS Border-Gavaskar Trophy series. In an Adelaide Test, he scored one run in the first innings and 25 in the second.Sourav Ganguly, who crafted many memorable moments for India as captain, concluded his Test career in Border-Gavaskar series. In his final Test in Nagpur in 2008, Ganguly scored a solid 85 runs in the first innings but was dismissed for a duck in the second.Virender Sehwag, renowned for his fearless and aggressive batting, ended his Test career in the Border-Gavaskar series. His final Test match was played against Australia in 2013 at Hyderabad.Rahul Dravid, the "Wall" of Indian cricket, concluded his Test career in IND vs AUS Border-Gavaskar series. His final Test match was against Australia in 2012 at Adelaide Oval.Anil Kumble, India's legendary spin bowler, played his final Test match in Border-Gavaskar series. In 2008, Kumble featured in his last Test against Australia in Delhi, where despite the dominance of batsmen, he claimed three wickets.

newsArray.title: Shreyas Iyer Double Ton, Nishant Sindhu Takes Eight Wickets in Ranji Trophy 2024
newsArray.description: Star Indian batter Shreyas Iyer, who was not included in India’s 18-member squad picked for the upcoming five-match Test series against Australia, registered his best score in First Class cricket on Thursday (November 7) by scoring 233 runs for Mumbai in the ongoing Ranji Trophy Elite Group A match against Odisha. The 29-year-old right-handed batter came out to bat at No. 5 for the Ajinkya Rahane-led side at Sharad Pawar Cricket Academy BKC in Mumbai, and during his 228-ball stay at the crease, he hammered 24 fours and nine sixes. He added 354 runs for the fourth wicket with Siddhesh Lad, who was unbeaten on 165 runs from 331 balls at the time of lunch on Day 2.
